scripts.install-all: npm i && concurrently 'cd ./frontend && npm i' 'cd ./backend && npm i'
scripts.dev: concurrently 'npm run backend' 'npm run stripe' 'npm run frontend'
scripts.build-all: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-backend
scripts.clean-all-build: npm run clean-frontend-build && npm run clean-backend-build
scripts.preview-frontend: npm run build-frontend && npm run preview --prefix frontend
scripts.preview-backend: npm run build-backend && concurrently 'npm run stripe --prefix backend' 'npm run start --prefix backend'
scripts.preview-all: npm run clean-all-build && npm run preview-backend & npm run preview-frontend
